divs: Sighting Detailsfirst there was one and then about 15 mins later there was about 40 to 20 lite in the sky they all started moving and 10 mins befor 11 they shot something out of the sky i dont kno were to report this so can u help rite way they are still in the sky as i am writeing to you ty anthony cacciatore call me rite way plz
